title: What are the advantages of using CD spectroscopy over NMR? - Quora

response.answer_text: CD will give you the answer (to the few questions it's capable of aswering) instantly. It's very easy to run a dozen CDs varying pH for example.NMR can give answers to many more questions, but requires isotope labeling, a ton of work to analyze the spectra, and for something complex may not give any answers at all.
